specialties: Great power but at a heavy cost
business: Most with an aberrant mark are assassins, mercenaries, or evil wizards
characteristics: Aberrant marks are unpredictable and dangerous to both the bearer and the people around them. Someone with such a mark can kill with a touch or control minds with a glance.

Aberrant marks often appear when people from different dragonmarked families produce a child, and for this reason such unions are absolutely forbidden by the Twelve. However, they can appear on any race at any age at any time.
